steps.title: Add 4 cups of water into a pitcher.
steps.content: Add 4 cups of water into a pitcher.

steps.title: Add 3/4 cup of Vimto cordial syrup into the pitcher.
steps.content: Add 3/4 cup of Vimto cordial syrup into the pitcher. You can buy Vimto at your local food market (usually sold in a can version) or online.

steps.title: Add more sugar 1 tablespoon at a time as desired and stir until all sugar is dissolved.
steps.content: Add more sugar 1 tablespoon at a time as desired and stir until all sugar is dissolved.

steps.title: Pour the mixture into a serving of 2 cups.
steps.content: Pour the mixture into a serving of 2 cups.

steps.title: Add ice cubes if desired, depending on how much the ice dilutes the drink.
steps.content: Add ice cubes if desired, depending on how much the ice dilutes the drink. If the concentrate is still cold, ice might not be necessary.

steps.title: Add berries to the juice of Vimto in each serving.
steps.content: Add berries to the juice of Vimto in each serving. The recommended number is 6 berries (3 blueberries and 3 red raspberries)

steps.title: Finish with a garnish to your drink.
steps.content: Finish with a garnish to your drink. A sprig of fresh mint leaves, for example, traditionally goes well with Vimto. The garnish you choose should be suitable for your drink. For extra mint flavor, bruise the leaves first. A thin-sliced lemon on the edge of the glass is also the perfect complementary garnish.

steps.title: Now you are ready to drink your Vimto drink.
steps.content: Now you are ready to drink your Vimto drink. Decorate the glass with a tiny umbrella (optional), and add a straw.

steps.title: Add a few spearmint mint leaves into a glass cup serving.
steps.content: Add a few spearmint mint leaves into a glass cup serving. Insert around 5-6 mint leaves.

steps.title: Cut one lime in half and press it onto a lime press over the cup.
steps.content: Cut one lime in half and press it onto a lime press over the cup. Twist the lime over the press to get as much juice out as possible. If you don't have a lime press, squeeze the lime to get most of the juice out.

steps.title: Add 2 tablespoons of Vimto cordial syrup into the glass cup serving.
steps.content: Add 2 tablespoons of Vimto cordial syrup into the glass cup serving.

steps.title: Add ice cubes as desired into the cup.
steps.content: Add ice cubes as desired into the cup.

steps.title: Add about 250ml of soda water into the cup.
steps.content: Add about 250ml of soda water into the cup. Any brand of soda water is suitable for this recipe as it depends on your taste or preference. You can buy soda water at your local grocery store or online.
